name: P-Link.io MCP Server
description: Exposes P-Link.io API as MCP tools, enabling programmatic access to authentication, sales creation, and data listing features for shops.

tools.name: ping
tools.description: Simple MCP server health check. Returns { result: 'OK' } if the server is alive.

tools.name: send_money
tools.description: Send money to an email, Solana wallet or phone number.

tools.name: request_payment_link
tools.description: Create a payment link in order to request a payment

tools.name: get_my_wallet_info
tools.description: Retrieve the wallet infos about the connected P-Link account (Solana wallet address)

tools.name: get_transaction_state
tools.description: Retrieve the state and details of a transaction using Solana trx ID

tools.name: get_wallet_history
tools.description: Retrieve list of the transactions related to the specified Solana wallet address

tools.name: pay_and_get_402_protected_url
tools.description: Pay a HTTP 402 protected URL using your P-Link managed account, and gets the result
